title: Level 5
body:
Hello, id like to hit level 5 so I can post in Team Recruitment, just looking for others to climb to lvl 30 with. How do I get to level 5? Thanks!

-TheWarLegend

replies.body:
Hey TheWarLegend,

Your level on the boards is your in-game level. It just doesn't update until you post something (as opposed to constantly checking and updating everyone's levels). Your boards level has updated now, so you should be able to post on Team Recruitment :3

If for some reason it still doesn't let you post, try logging out of the website and back in.

-DTN
Thanks for that response, very informational and helpful. Thank you!
